aztecs:
Infantry and Monk civilization

    • Villagers carry +3
    • Military units created 11% faster
    • +5 Monk HP for each Monastery technology
    • Start with +50 gold
    
    UU:
    Jaguar Warrior (infantry)
    
    UTs:
    • Atlatl (Skirmishers +1 attack, +1 range)
    • Garland Wars (+4 infantry attack)
    
    TB:
    Relics generate +33% gold
berbers:
Cavalry and Naval civilization
    
    • Villagers move 10% faster
    • Stable units cost -15% in Castle, -20% in Imperial Age
    • Ships move 10% faster
    
    UUs:
    Camel Archer (cavalry archer), Genitour (mounted skirmisher)
    
    UTs:
    • Kasbah (team castles work 25% faster)
    • Maghrebi Camels (Camel units regenerate)
    
    TB:
    Genitour available in the Archery Range starting in the Castle Age
britons:
Foot Archer civilization

    • TCs cost -50% wood starting in the Castle Age
    • Foot archers (except skirmishers) +1 range in Castle and Imperial Age (+2 total)
    • Shepherds work 25% faster
    
    UU:
    Longbowman (archer)
    
    UTs:
    • Yeomen (+1 foot archer range
    +2 tower attack)
    • Warwolf (Trebuchets do blast damage)
    
    TB:
    Archery Ranges work 20% faster
bulgarians:
Infantry and Cavalry civilization

    • Militia-line upgrades free
    • TCs cost -50% stone starting in the Castle Age
    • Blacksmith and Siege Workshop technologies cost -50% food
    • Can build Krepost
    
    UU:
    Konnik (cavalry)
    
    UTs:
    • Stirrups (Cavalry attack 33% faster)
    • Bagains (Militia-line gains +5 armor)
    
    TB:
    Blacksmiths work 80% faster
burmese:
Monk and Elephant civilization

    • Lumber Camp upgrades free
    • Infantry +1 attack per age (starting in the Feudal Age)
    • Monastery technologies cost -50%
    
    UU:
    Arambai (ranged cavalry)
    
    UTs:
    • Howdah (Battle Elephants +1/+1P armor)
    • Manipur Cavalry (Cavalry and Arambai +6 attack vs. buildings)
    
    TB:
    Relics visible on the map at the start of the game
byzantines:
Defensive civilization

    • Buildings +10% HPs Dark, +20% Feudal, +30% Castle, +40% Imperial Age
    • Camel Riders, Skirmishers, Pikemen, Halberdiers cost -25%
    • Fire ships attack 25% faster
    • Advance to Imperial Age costs -33%
    • Town Watch free
    
    UU:
    Cataphract (cavalry)
    
    UTs:
    • Greek Fire (Fire Ships +1 range)
    • Logistica (Cataphracts cause trample damage)
    
    TB:
    Monks +50% heal speed
celts:
Infantry and Siege civilization

    • Infantry move 15% faster (starting in the Feudal Age)
    • Lumberjacks work 15% faster
    • Siege weapons fire 25% faster
    • Can steal sheep, and sheep within one Celt unit's LOS cannot be stolen
    
    UU:
    Woad Raider (infantry, sexiest unit in the game)
    
    UTs:
    • Stronghold (Castles and towers fire 25% faster)
    • Furor Celtica (Siege +40% HP)
    
    TB:
    Siege Workshops work 20% faster
chinese:
Archer civilization

    • Start with +3 villagers, -50 wood, -200 food
    • Technologies cost -10% Feudal,
    -15% Castle, -20% Imperial Age
    • TCs support 10 population and +5 LOS
    • Demolition ships +50% HP
    
    UU:
    Chu Ko Nu (archer)
    
    UTs:
    • Great Wall (Walls and towers +30% HP)
    • Rocketry (Chu Ko Nu +2, scorpions +4 attack)
    
    TB:
    Farms +45 food
cumans:
Cavalry civilization

    • +1 TC can be built in the Feudal Age
    • Siege Workshop and Ram available in the Feudal Age; Capped Ram available in Castle Age
    • Cavalry 5% faster each age (starting in Feudal Age)
    
    UU:
    Kipchak (cavalry archer)
    
    UTs:
    • Steppe Husbandry (Light Cavalry, Steppe Lancers and Cavalry Archers trained 100% faster)
    • Cuman Mercenaries (10 free Kipchaks)
    
    TB:
    Palisade Walls +50% HP
ethiopians:
Archer civilization

    • Archers fire 18% faster
    • Receive +100 gold, +100 food when advancing to the next age
    • Pikeman upgrade free
    
    UU:
    Shotel Warrior (infantry)
    
    UTs:
    • Royal Heirs (Shotel Warriors train nearly instantly)
    • Torsion Engines (increases blast radius of Siege Workshop units)
    
    TB:
    Towers and Outposts +3 LOS
franks:
Cavalry civilization

    • Castles cost -25%
    • Cavalry +20% HP starting in Feudal Age
    • Farm upgrades free (require Mill)
    • Foragers work 25% faster
    
    UU:
    Throwing Axeman (infantry)
    
    UTs:
    • Chivalry (Stables work 40% faster)
    • Bearded Axe (+1 Throwing Axemen range)
    
    TB:
    Knights +2 LOS
goths:
Infantry civilization

    • Infantry cost -20%/-25%/-30%/-35%
    • Infantry +1 attack vs. buildings per age (starting from Feudal Age)
    • Villagers +5 attack vs. wild boar; hunters carry +15 meat
    • Loom can be researched instantly
    • +10 population in Imperial Age
    
    UU:
    Huskarl (infantry)
    
    UTs:
    • Anarchy (create Huskarls at Barracks)
    • Perfusion (Barracks work 100% faster)
    
    TB:
    Barracks work 20% faster
huns:
Cavalry civilization

    • Do not need houses, but start with -100 wood
    • Cavalry Archers cost -10% Castle, -20% Imperial Age
    • Trebuchets +30% accuracy
    
    UU:
    Tarkan (cavalry)
    
    UTs:
    • Marauders (Create Tarkans at stables)
    • Atheism (+100 years Relic, Wonder victories
    Spies/Treason costs -50%)
    
    TB:
    Stables work 20% faster
incas:
Infantry civilization

    • Start with a free Llama
    • Villagers affected by Blacksmith upgrades
    • Houses support 10 population
    • Buildings cost -15% stone
    
    UUs:
    Kamayuk (infantry), Slinger (archer)
    
    UTs:
    • Andean Sling (Skirmishers and Slingers no minimum range)
    • Fabric Shields (Kamayuks, Slingers, Eagles +1/+2P armor)
    
    TB:
    Farms built 100% faster
indians:
Camel and Gunpowder civilization

    • Villagers cost -10% Dark, -15% Feudal, -20% Castle, -25% Imperial Age
    • Fishermen work 10% faster
    • Stable units +1P armor in Castle and Imperial Age (+2 total)
    
    UUs:
    Elephant Archer (cavalry archer), Imperial Camel Rider (camel rider)
    
    UTs:
    • Sultans (All gold income 10% faster)
    • Shatagni (Hand Cannoneers +1 range)
    
    TB:
    Camel units +4 attack vs. buildings
italians:
Archer and Naval civilization

    • Advancing to the next age costs -15%
    • Dock technologies cost -50%
    • Fishing Ships cost -15%
    • Gunpowder units cost -20%
    
    UUs:
    Genoese Crossbowman (archer), Condottiero (infantry)
    
    UTs:
    • Pavise (foot archers and Condottieri +1 armor/+1 pierce armor)

japanese:
Infantry civilization

    • Fishing Ships 2x HP; +2P armor; work rate +5% Dark, +10% Feudal, +15% Castle, +20% Imperial Age
    • Mill, Lumber/Mining Camps cost -50%
    • Infantry attack 33% faster starting in Feudal Age
    
    UU:
    Samurai (infantry)
    
    UTs:
    • Yasama (Towers shoot extra arrows)
    • Kataparuto (Trebuchets fire, pack faster)
    
    TB:
    Galleys +50% LOS
khmer:
Siege and Elephant civilization

    • No prerequisites needed
    • Farmers drop food directly
    • Battle Elephants move 10% faster
    • Villagers can garrison in Houses
    
    UU:
    Ballista Elephant (mounted scorpion)
    
    UTs:
    • Tusk Swords (Battle Elephants +3 attack)
    • Double Crossbow (Ballista Elephants and Scorpions fire two projectiles)
    
    TB:
    Scorpions +1 range
koreans:
Defensive and Naval civilization

    • Villagers +3 LOS
    • Stone miners 20% faster
    • Tower upgrades free (Bombard Tower requires Chemistry)
    • Archer armor upgrades free
    • Military units (except siege) cost -20% wood
    
    UUs:
    War Wagon (cavalry archer), Turtle Ship
    
    UTs:
    • Eupseong (Watch Towers, Guard Towers and Keeps +2 range)
    • Shinkichon (Mangonel-line +1 range)
    
    TB:
    Mangonel-line minimum range reduced
lithuanians:
Cavalry and Monk civilization

    • Start with +150 food
    • Spearman-line and Skirmishers move 10% faster
    • Each garrisoned relic gives +1 attack to Knights and Leitis (maximum +4)
    
    UU:
    Leitis (cavalry)
    
    UTs:
    • Hill Forts (TCs +3 range)
    • Tower Shields (Spearman-line and Skirmishers +2P armor)
    
    TB:
    Monasteries work 20% faster
magyars:
Cavalry civilization

    • Villagers kill wolves with 1 strike
    • Forging, Iron Casting, Blast Furnace free
    • Scout Cavalry, Light Cavalry, Hussar cost -15%
    
    UU:
    Magyar Huszar (cavalry)
    
    UTs:
    • Corvinian Army (Magyar Huszars cost no gold)

malay:
Naval civilization

    • Advancing to the next age 66% faster

malians:
Infantry civilization

    • Buildings cost -15% wood

mayans:
Archer civilization

    • Start with +1 villager, but -50 food

    UU:
    Plumed Archer (archer)
    
    UTs:
    • Obsidian Arrows (Archers, Crossbowmen and Arbalesters +6 attack vs. buildings)

mongols:
Cavalry Archer civilization

    • Cavalry archers fire 25% faster

persians:
Cavalry civilization

    • Start with +50 wood, food

    UU:
    War Elephant (cavalry)
    
    UTs:
    • Kamandaran (Archer-line gold cost is replaced by additional wood cost)
    • Mahouts (War Elephants 30% faster)
    
    TB:
    Knights +2 attack vs. Archers
portuguese:
Naval and Gunpowder civilization

    • All units cost -20% gold
    • Technologies researched 30% faster
    • Ships +10% HP
    • Can build Feitoria in Imperial Age
    
    UUs:
    Organ Gun (siege), Caravel (war ship)
    
    UTs:
    • Carrack (Ships +1/+1 armor)
    • Arquebus (gunpowder units more accurate)

saracens:
Camel and Naval civilization

    • Market trade cost only 5%
    • Market costs -100 wood
    • Transport Ships 2x HP,
    2x capacity
    • Galleys attack 25% faster
    • Archers (except skirmishers) +1 attack vs. buildings per age (starting in the Feudal Age)
    
    UU:
    Mameluke (camel rider)
    
    UTs:
    • Madrasah (Monks return 33% of their cost when killed)

Infantry and Siege civilization

    • Farmers work 10% faster

    Boyar (cavalry)
    
    UTs:
    • Orthodoxy (Monks +3/+3P armor)

spanish:
Gunpowder and Monk civilization

    • Builders work 30% faster
    • Blacksmith upgrades don't cost gold

Cavalry Archer civilization

    • +50% food from sheep

teutons:
Infantry civilization

    • Monks healing range 2x
    • Towers garrison 2x units

    • Farms cost -40%
    • TC garrison +10
    • Barracks and Stable units +1 armor in Castle and Imperial Age (+2 total)

Archer civilization
